a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of foreign aid spent domestically within donor countries, 2023

Net
official development assistance (ODA)
that stays in donor countries, as a share of total ODA.
Note: Administrative costs represent only expenses not already included as integral parts of other ODA delivery. While some costs (like
diplomatic staff) are spent within recipient countries, they don't reach the intended aid beneficiaries.
